Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Input
Class MouseState

java.lang.Object
  System.ValueType
      Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Input.MouseState

public final class MouseState
extends ValueType

Represents the state of a mouse input device, including mouse cursor position and buttons pressed.

Author:
Halofreak1990
